title: General Tools Glass Cutter #8501 - Perfect for Plate Glass, Mirrors, Window Panes, Custom Picture Frames, Shelves and Stained Glass
description:
General Tools 8501 Glass Cutter is perfect for precisely and smoothly cutting plate glass 1/8” to ¼” thick. This heavy-duty tool has a steel wheel with a honed angle of 120 degree for cutting single or double strength glass. Ergonomic designed tapered handle boasts a flat surface near cutting wheel for a comfortable finger position, providing the best leverage. The handle also includes a weighted ball that provides elevation to snap off scored glass.

The General Tools 8501 Glass Cutter is perfect for cutting glass and DIY projects including mirrors, window panes, custom picture frames, glass shelves and stained glass.

Instructions
• Coat cutting wheel with oil prior to scoring glass
• Measure glass and score glass surface with an even firm pressure
• Place ball of handle, or small dowel, under scored glass to elevate and press evenly on both sides of glass
****When handling glass, it is recommended to wear gloves to prevent cuts
